name: Fruit Match - Garden Hero
description:
MATCH FRUITS IN THE GARDEN AND CLEAR THEM NOW!
In the garden there are many fruits out there for you to collect,those fruits have magic features,they only can be collected by matching them. So in this harvest season,you have to match those fruits to collect them. Rule is quit simply.
Switch the adjacent fruits. Make 3 or more with the same together to eliminate them. The backplanes will be eliminated too. Complete the goals showed on the top to win the levels before you run out of moves.
Match Fruit is one of the best match 3 puzzle game with fresh garden fruit!
This is a very popular fruits matching game,simply link up same fruits according to rules and let them vanish,until all the them disappear!

Match Fruit features:
- Lovely UI and cool animation effects.
- No complicated rules!
- Powerful boosts,Fun and Fun!
- Unique levels, challenging puzzles!
- Different obstacles in the levels to make the game more challenging.
- It’s easy to learn but tough to be a master.
- Over 300 interesting levels
- Multiple game goals, time mode, move mode, and diamond collecting levels.
